attributes.action: change the system of MP's electorate allowances to reflect actual workloads and casework instead of a flat allowance system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It appears that all MPs receive electorate allowances on a flat rate system instead of being based on an actual workload or casework basis.

This means that some MPs with a low volume traffic / workload are getting subsidised by those MPs whose electorate office is very busy.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the House authorites. Please contact Parliament directly.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
